abstract: The sentence of John Rigas, 83, was reduced to 12 years from 15 years, and the sentence of Timothy Rigas, 52, was reduced to 17 years from 20 years, prosecutors said.
snippet: The sentence of John Rigas, 83, was reduced to 12 years from 15 years, and the sentence of Timothy Rigas, 52, was reduced to 17 years from 20 years, prosecutors said.
lead_paragraph: The prison sentences of John J. Rigas, the founder of Adelphia Communications, and his son Timothy were reduced by three years each on Tuesday after an appeals court overturned a count of bank fraud.

headline.main: Sentences Reduced for Adelphia Founder and Son
